price: Yεde asotwee no bεbͻ ho ama no wͻ wusͻreε da no, na ͻbεtena mu wͻ animguaseε mu.
arabic: يُضَٰعَفۡ لَهُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وَيَخۡلُدۡ فِيهِۦ مُهَانًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yuḍāʿaf lahu al-ʿadhābu yawma al-qiyāmati wayakhlud fīhi muhānan
